name: Creck
description:
Our C-R3C begins him adventure with a single sentence revolving in his mind. A voice telling him, '' You are a despicable piece of scrap with no feelings.''

      C-R3C was one of the remants of the old world. Human companions of C-R3C took him them and called him Crec. But, his lack of emotion caused him to be ostracized from the society. Because, the lack of emotion is also why the world is the way it is.

      Crec opens his eyes in the junkyard. He is a pretty unexperienced robot, literally anything can attract him, especially colorful things. He sees a butterfly and it gets him excited. He gains the Double Jump feature with the feeling of excitement he experienced.

      ‘’Press SPACE button rapidly for Double Jump.’’

      He sees a gap after advancing. Oh no… Pitty Crac, the little rat freak it out. He gains the Dash feature with the feeling of fear.

      ‘’Press J for Dash.’’

      When he escapes from the junkyard and reaches the forest, he sees a child. The child is giving him a flower. Little One’s gift, makes Crec invincible againts all terrifying beings. He gains the Shield feature with the feeling of happines.

      ‘’When you are Happy, you can stand one damage.’’

       While walking through this enchanted forest, a savage appears before him. This Lumberjack… This fricking guy makes Crec mad. He gains the Fireball feature with the feeling of anger.

      ‘’Press K for Throw a Fireball.’’

 

      After all these new experiences, he opens up to the world and sets sail for new adventures.
